setEffects.2: Increases the DMG dealt by Follow-up ATK by {{1, percent}}%.
setEffects.4: When the wearer uses a Follow-up ATK, increases the wearer's ATK by {{1, percent}}% for every time the Follow-up ATK deals DMG. This effect can stack up to {{2}} time(s) and lasts for {{3}} turn(s). This effect is removed the next time the wearer uses a Follow-up ATK.
